articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: China station admits New Year's drone show was prerecorded
articles.description: A Shanghai TV station has acknowledged that footage of a formation of 2,000 drones flying over the city broadcast on New Year's Eve had actually been prerecorded days before
articles.content:
Due to the high crowd at the Bund on New Years Eve, watching the drone show may cause safety problems, so the rehearsal and recording time of the drone was moved forward, the station said in its statement.
The decision was likely informed by memories of a De… [+480 chars]

articles.author: Rudi Greenberg
articles.title: Drink your veggies: 5 places for green smoothies in the D.C. area
articles.description: Is your new year’s resolution to eat more fruits and vegetables? Smoothies are an easy way to do that.
articles.content: The next year, Keenan moved back to Charlottesville, where he went to law school, and started a vegan smoothie and juice company. After selling online and locally at markets, the Juice Laundry opened its first shop near the University of Virginia in 2015 befo… [+6630 chars]
